meanings.definition: A person of learning; a scholar.

meanings.sent2: The university invited renowned savants to give lectures.
meanings.sent3: The group of savants argued over the correct interpretation of the poem.
meanings.sent4: She was a savant in the field of mathematics, solving complex problems effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The young savant amazed everyone with his ability to memorize entire books.

meanings.sent5: The historical savant could recite dates and events with incredible accuracy.
